statements: SELECT participant_id, participant_name, survival_rating FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE survival_rating > 8;
SELECT participant_name, course_start_date, course_end_date FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE course_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE participant_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT participant_id, course_start_date, course_end_date FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE course_end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_name, survival_rating, course_start_date, course_end_date FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE survival_rating BETWEEN 5 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE survival_rating >= 8 ORDER BY course_end_date DESC, participant_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT participant_name, course_start_date, course_end_date FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE survival_rating < 5;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, survival_rating FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE course_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants ORDER BY survival_rating DESC, participant_id ASC LIMIT 5, 5;
SELECT participant_id, participant_name FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE course_end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY course_end_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT participant_id, name, age FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT participant_id, name, gender, start_date FROM participants ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE date_achieved BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT participant_id, achievement_name FROM achievements WHERE participant_id = 3 ORDER BY date_achieved DESC;
SELECT * FROM participants ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT participant_id, name, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 25
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY date_achieved ASC
SELECT participant_id, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM achievements WHERE participant_id = 3
SELECT * FROM participants JOIN achievements ON participants.participant_id = achievements.participant_id
SELECT * FROM participants;
SELECT id, name FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM progress ORDER BY day DESC;
SELECT participant_id, SUM(miles_walked) AS total_miles FROM progress GROUP BY participant_id;
SELECT participant_id, COUNT(achievement_type) AS total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY participant_id HAVING total_achievements > 2;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE miles_walked >= 5.0 AND challenges_completed < 3;
SELECT participant_id, achievement_type, date_achieved FROM achievements ORDER BY date_achieved DESC;
SELECT p.name, pr.miles_walked, a.achievement_type FROM participants p JOIN progress pr ON p.id = pr.participant_id JOIN achievements a ON p.id = a.participant_id;
SELECT p.name, a.achievement_type, a.date_achieved FROM participants p LEFT JOIN achievements a ON p.id = a.participant_id WHERE a.date_achieved BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT name, age FROM Participants WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT participant_id, name, starting_date FROM Participants WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM Camps WHERE location LIKE '%Beach%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT p.name, s.skill_name, a.completion_date FROM Participants p JOIN Achievements a ON p.participant_id = a.participant_id JOIN Skills s ON a.skill_id = s.skill_id;
SELECT * FROM Participants WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, gender, starting_date FROM Participants WHERE gender = 'Female' AND ending_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT p.name, c.location, s.skill_name FROM Participants p INNER JOIN Achievements a ON p.participant_id = a.participant_id INNER JOIN Skills s ON a.skill_id = s.skill_id INNER JOIN Camps c ON c.start_date <= a.completion_date AND c.end_date >= a.completion_date;

SELECT p.name, COUNT(a.achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM Participants p LEFT JOIN Achievements a ON p.participant_id = a.participant_id GROUP BY p.name HAVING total_achievements >= 3 ORDER BY total_achievements DESC;

SELECT c.location, COUNT(DISTINCT p.participant_id) AS total_participants FROM Camps c LEFT JOIN Achievements a ON c.start_date <= a.completion_date AND c.end_date >= a.completion_date LEFT JOIN Participants p ON a.participant_id = p.participant_id GROUP BY c.location HAVING total_participants > 10 ORDER BY total_participants DESC;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM Participants WHERE age > 25;
SELECT course_name, start_date, location FROM Courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, course_name, progress_status FROM Participants p INNER JOIN Progress pr ON p.participant_id = pr.participant_id WHERE pr.progress_status = 'completed';
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM Achievements WHERE participant_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Participants;
SELECT participant_name, age, emergency_contact FROM Participants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date, location FROM Courses WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT participant_name, gender, achievement_name FROM Participants p JOIN Achievements a ON p.participant_id = a.participant_id WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT supply_name, quantity, description FROM Supplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
